mean_cn: n.材料，原料；  adj.物质的，客观存在的
mean_en: a substance that things can be made from; cloth used for making clothes, curtains, etc.; things that are needed in order to do a particular activity; information or ideas used in books, etc.
sentence: Many different materials are needed for construction work.
sentence_trans: 建造工程需要很多种不同的建筑材料。
